content.rendered:
Orhopedic Physician Assistant | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time 4-5 days a week
  • Will see triage patients, create assessments and treatment plans, order testing, and perform necessary treatment
  • 5+ years of previous experience
  • Orthopedic experience
  • Graduation from an accredited Physician’s Assistant program.
  • Certification from the National Commission on Certification of Physician’s Assistants
  • $85,000/year + benefits and PTO

Certification from the National Commission on Certification of Physician’s Assistants $85,000/year + benefits and PTO
